itemLabel: Peter Pilkington, Baron Pilkington of Oxenford

wikipedia_page.main: Peter Pilkington, Baron Pilkington of Oxenford (5 September 1933 – 14 February 2011) was a British public school headmaster and a Conservative member of the House of Lords.
